name: jsorolla
description: JSorolla is a JavaScript Library for biological and genomic data visualization.

scripts.core: cd src/core && cat *.js cache/*.js webcomponents/*.js webcomponents/opencga/variant/*.js clients/*.js data-source/*.js visualisation/*.js data-adapter/feature-adapter.js widgets/*.js > ../../dist/core.js && cd data-adapter && cat $(ls -I 'feature-adapter.js' | grep .js) >> ../../../dist/core.js && cd ../../.. && node_modules/uglify-es/bin/uglifyjs dist/core.js -o dist/core.min.js
scripts.genome-browser: cd src/genome-browser && cat *.js renderers/renderer.js renderers/*-renderer.js tracks/feature-track.js > ../../dist/genome-browser/genome-browser.js && cd tracks && cat $(ls -I 'feature-track.js' | grep .js) >> ../../../dist/genome-browser/genome-browser.js && cd ../../.. && node_modules/uglify-es/bin/uglifyjs dist/genome-browser/genome-browser.js -o dist/genome-browser/genome-browser.min.js
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/genome-browser && npm run core && npm run genome-browser
scripts.build: npm run dist && cp dist/genome-browser/*.js build && cp src/genome-browser/genome-browser.html build
